description: ImplicitGeometryProperty links a feature or property to an implicit geometry.

properties.name: transformationMatrix
properties.description: Specifies the mathematical transformation (translation, rotation, and scaling) between the prototypical geometry and the actual spatial position of the object.

properties.name: referencePoint
properties.description: Relates to a 3D Point geometry that represents the base point of the object in the coordinate system of the database.
